column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " This is a sacred temple !
#Text=But , you 're twelve .
#Text=" Teo says : " Dad , he 's the Avatar .
#Text=He used to come here a hundred years ago .
#Text=" Aang says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=Who said you could be here ?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Hmm , doing here ... A long time ago , but not a hundred years , my people became refugees after a terrible flood .
#Text=My infant son , Teo , was badly hurt and lost his mother .
#Text=I needed somewhere to rebuild and I stumbled across this place .
#Text=Could n't believe it !
#Text=Everywhere !
#Text=Pictures of flying people !
#Text=But empty , nobody home .
#Text=Then , I came across these fan - like contraptions !
#Text=" Aang says : " Our gliders .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Yes !
#Text=Little , light flying machines !
#Text=They gave me an idea .
#Text=Build a new life for my son , in the air !
#Text=Then everyone will be on equal ground !
#Text=So to speak .
#Text=We 're just in the process of improving upon what 's already here .
#Text=And , after all , is n't that what nature does ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Nature knows where to stop .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " I suppose that 's true .
#Text=Unfortunately , progress has a way of getting away from us .
#Text=Look at the time !
#Text=Come !
#Text=The pulley system must be oiled before dark .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait , how can you tell the time from that thing ?
#Text=The notches all look the same .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " The candle will tell us .
#Text=Watch .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You put spark powder in the candle !
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Four flashes .
#Text=So it 's exactly four hours past mid-day .
#Text=Or , as I call it : four o'candle .
#Text=If you like that , wait till you see my finger - safe knife sharpener .
#Text=Only took me three tries to get it right .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aaah !
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Follow me !
#Text=" Teo says : " Hey , Aang .
#Text=I want to show you something .
#Text=" Aang says : " I just ca n't get over it .
#Text=There 's not a single thing that 's the same .
#Text=" Teo says : " I do n't know about that .
#Text=The temple might be different but the creatures that live here are probably direct descendants of the ones who lived here a long time ago .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're right .
#Text=They 're kind of keepers of the temple 's origins .
#Text=" Teo says : " Besides , there 's one part of the temple that has n't changed at all .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , it 's just like the one in the other temple !
#Text=" Teo says : " Only an airbender can open it , so inside it 's completely untouched .
#Text=Just the way the monks left it .
#Text=I 've always wondered what it 's like in there ... " Katara says : " Aang ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=This is the last part of the temple that 's the same as it was .
#Text=I want it to stay that way .
#Text=" Teo says : " I completely understand .
#Text=I just wanted you to know that it 's here .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks .
#Text=" Sokka says : " These lanterns are terrible .
#Text=I ca n't see !
#Text=Why would you want to use fireflies for light ?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Hey !
#Text=Close that up !
#Text=They 'll get loose !
#Text=Fireflies are a non-flammable light source .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Cover your nose and hold your breath .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay ... so you brought me all the way down here to see an empty room .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Wrong .
#Text=It 's filled to the brim with natural gas .
#Text=Came across it my first time here .
#Text=Unfortunately , I was carrying a torch at the time .
#Text=Nearly blew my self and the whole place even more sky high !
#Text=Thought my eyebrows would never grow back .
#Text=Anyway , there 's a vital problem that needs solving .
#Text=From time to time , we have gas leaks .
#Text=And they 're nearly impossible to find .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , this place is an explosion waiting to happen .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Yes , until I figure out how to locate something I ca n't see , hear , smell , or touch .
#Text="
